sentences.sContent: The young salesgirl rowed fiercely with the manager yesterday morning.
sentences.sContent_eng: The young salesgirl rowed fiercely with the manager yesterday morning.
sentences.sCn: 昨天上午这位年轻的女售货员与经理大吵大闹。

sentences.sContent: Worked 21 hours weekly as a salesgirl at the bookstore of Shenzhen University. Earned 45％ of college expenses.
sentences.sContent_eng: Worked 21 hours weekly as a salesgirl at the bookstore of Shenzhen University. Earned 45％ of college expenses.
sentences.sCn: 在深圳大学书店当售货员，每周工作21小时，赚了大学费用的45％。

trans.tranOther: a young woman who sells things in a shop
